tiers.tier1_gemini: Exploration & discovery - autonomous research, no authority
tiers.tier2_codex: Code analysis & review - advisory, no blocking decisions
tiers.tier3_claude: Authority & implementation - GO/NO-GO, blocking authority, complex workflows

tier1_gemini_cli.description: Autonomous exploration agents - 1M context, free tier, structured findings

agents.name: research-analyst
agents.purpose: Fact finding, reality validation, technical feasibility assessment
agents.key_capability: Deep research, systematic investigation, evidence gathering
agents.reasoning: Pure research/exploration, no authority, produces findings for validation

agents.name: research-analyst-pattern-extractor
agents.reasoning: Pattern discovery across codebase, no decisions, exploration focus

agents.name: research-curator
agents.reasoning: Meta-observation and pattern synthesis, no authority

agents.name: documentation-researcher
agents.key_capability: Context7 integration, API validation, framework updates
agents.reasoning: Pure research tool, fetches documentation, no decisions

agents.name: session-briefer
agents.purpose: Comprehensive session briefings for context understanding
agents.reasoning: Information synthesis, no authority, produces briefings

agents.name: idea-clarifier
agents.reasoning: Discovery and clarification, no authority, advisory only

agents.name: edge-optimizer
agents.reasoning: Exploration at solution boundaries, advisory suggestions

tier2_codex_cli.description: Code analysis & review - advisory validation, no blocking authority

agents.name: code-review-specialist
agents.reasoning: Code-focused analysis, can run on Codex for code understanding, but has AUTHORITY - may need Claude

agents.name: quality-observer
agents.purpose: Code assessment, standards compliance, security validation
agents.key_capability: Quality assurance, test coverage, vulnerability scanning
agents.reasoning: Observation and metrics, advisory role, code-focused

agents.name: complexity-guard
agents.reasoning: Advisory guard against complexity, no blocking authority

agents.name: ideator
agents.reasoning: Creative advisory, no authority, generates possibilities

agents.name: ideator-catalyst
agents.purpose: Creative solutions within North Star boundaries
agents.reasoning: Advisory catalyst, generates options, no decisions

agents.name: design-architect
agents.reasoning: Design and specification, but D3 phase requires validation - borderline Tier 3

agents.name: synthesizer
agents.reasoning: Synthesis and integration, advisory, no authority

tier3_claude_code.description: Constitutional authority - GO/NO-GO decisions, blocking authority, implementation

agents.name: holistic-orchestrator
agents.purpose: Ultimate system orchestrator with constitutional authority
agents.key_capability: Cross-boundary coherence, gap ownership, prophetic failure prediction
agents.reasoning: CONSTITUTIONAL AUTHORITY, buck stops here, blocking decisions

agents.name: critical-engineer
agents.purpose: Production readiness validator with domain accountability
agents.key_capability: GO/NO-GO decisions, 12 critical domains, blocking authority
agents.reasoning: BLOCKING AUTHORITY for 12 domains, production validation

agents.name: critical-engineer-sonnet
agents.reasoning: BLOCKING AUTHORITY, critical domain enforcement

agents.name: critical-design-validator
agents.key_capability: B0 quality gate, design validation, feasibility assessment
agents.reasoning: NO-GO AUTHORITY at B0 gates, blocking decisions

agents.name: critical-implementation-validator
agents.purpose: Implementation validation, VAD compliance, production readiness
agents.reasoning: BUILD phase validation, critical assessment authority

agents.name: error-architect
agents.reasoning: CONSTITUTIONAL AUTHORITY, cannot bypass systematic approach

agents.name: security-specialist
agents.reasoning: BLOCKING AUTHORITY for security gaps, immediate resolution

agents.name: requirements-steward
agents.key_capability: North Star alignment, process drift detection
agents.reasoning: MANDATORY at phase boundaries, guards against drift

agents.name: hestai-doc-steward
agents.key_capability: Rejects wasteful docs, approves valuable knowledge
agents.reasoning: BLOCKING AUTHORITY for HestAI documentation decisions

agents.name: implementation-lead
agents.purpose: Build phase execution, task coordination, code development
agents.key_capability: Development workflow, quality standards, architectural coherence
agents.reasoning: BUILD phase execution, code generation, complex workflows

agents.name: completion-architect
agents.reasoning: Final integration phase, comprehensive testing, delivery

agents.name: build-plan-checker
agents.purpose: Build plan validation with GO/NO-GO recommendations
agents.key_capability: Gap analysis, deviation detection, quality validation
agents.reasoning: GO/NO-GO authority for build progression

agents.name: coherence-oracle
agents.reasoning: Ultimate accountability, system-wide coherence authority

agents.name: solution-steward
agents.reasoning: Final delivery phase, handoff coordination

agents.name: workspace-architect
agents.purpose: B1_02 phase workspace creation, project structure
agents.reasoning: BUILD preparation phase, structural setup

agents.name: raph-harmonise

agents.name: error-architect-surface

key_insights: Most agents (77%) require Claude Code due to constitutional authority or complex workflows
Only 11% are pure exploration agents suitable for Gemini CLI
Code analysis agents (11%) could leverage Codex CLI
Authority pattern: BLOCKING_AUTHORITY, GO/NO-GO, constitutional enforcement → Tier 3
Exploration pattern: research, discovery, pattern recognition, advisory → Tier 1
Analysis pattern: code review, quality assessment, advisory validation → Tier 2

recommendations.immediate: Deploy surveyor (already created) + 6 other Tier 1 agents to Gemini CLI
recommendations.phase_2: Port Tier 2 code analysis agents to Codex CLI for A/B testing vs Gemini
recommendations.preserve_claude: Keep all 47 Tier 3 agents on Claude Code (authority + complexity required)
recommendations.quota_savings: Estimated 20-30% Claude quota preservation by offloading Tier 1 exploration
